name: James Cameron's Dark Angel
synopsis: Based on the hit series created by Academy AwardÂ® winner James Cameron and Charles H. Eglee. Dark Angel is the story of max, a genetically enhanced soldier, who cunningly fights to reclaim her manipulated past and avoid capture through the underground landscape of post-apocalyptic Seattle. Her streetwise instincts and fearless hand-to-hand combat skills are crucial to her survival. Trusted cyber-jounalist Logan Cale aids Max's quest to defeat -|- Corp, the secret organization that rose out of the ashes of Manticore, her military creator, and discover the truth of her past.
